data.title: Chris Brown Seemingly Reacts To Rihanna And A$AP Rocky Having Their Baby
data.meta_description: Congratulations are in order as Rihanna and A$AP Rocky welcomed their first child. TMZ confirms that the couple gave birth to a baby boy. Of course everyone is congratulating the beautiful couple, as they are trending online as well. It seems as if Rihanna’s ex, Chris Brown, also shared his congratulations. He posted a message […]
data.text:
Congratulations are in order as Rihanna and A$AP Rocky welcomed their first child.

TMZ confirms that the couple gave birth to a baby boy. Of course everyone is congratulating the beautiful couple, as they are trending online as well. It seems as if Rihanna’s ex, Chris Brown, also shared his congratulations. He posted a message via his Instagram story that read, “congratulations” with the prayer hand emoji, a heart emoji, and a pregnant emoji.

Rihanna and A$AP shared the news that they were expecting their first child back in January. As fans patiently anticipated the baby’s arrival, the couple never missed a beat on sharing Rihanna’s baby bump journey with the people.
